title: 이달의소녀탐구 #478 (LOONA TV #478)
summary:
The two go to a restaurant that is very crowded.
0:10 -- ChuVes: "Dumpling Taste~". The two love the food.
0:25 -- Yves: "CLEAR~~~"
0:30 -- They go around a mall and sightsee. Yves points at pigs and calls them Chuu 1, 2, 3... Chuu: "no~ No~ NO~".
Yves: "8 pigs" (while pointing at Chuu). Chuu: "9 pigs" (while pointing at Yves). Chuu does a Karate chop in the process and "non violence" as she caresses her face.
0:43 -- Chuu: "It'll be hard to pick videos for LOOΠΔ TV since we have a lot of content"
0:50 -- ChuVes selca hours. (They look so good) and they start pulling each others hairs.
